dcterms:description: This dataset is downloaded from the crowd-sourced photo mapping platform Mapillary where two different perspectives of the same route are captured. It presents challenges due to confusing objects and dynamic distractors such as vehicles and pedestrians, leading to perceptual aliasing.
dcterms:title: Berlin Kudamm

dcterms:creator: W. Maddern
G. Pascoe
C. Linegar
P. Newman
dcterms:description: This dataset contains traverses of Oxford city captured during different seasonal cycles and times of the day, providing a drastic shift in visual appearance due to season and time of day.
dcterms:title: Oxford Robot Car

dcterms:creator: D. Olid

dcterms:description: This dataset captures a 728 km train journey during different seasonal cycles, presenting challenges due to extreme appearance variations.
dcterms:title: Nordland
